alert.note: Alert for Eddy County Plains; Southern Lea County (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 9:36PM MDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN EDDY...SOUTH CENTRAL LEA...NORTHWESTERN REEVES...NORTHWESTERN WARD...NORTHWESTERN WINKLER AND LOVING COUNTIES THROUGH 1115 PM CDT/1015 PM MDT/... At 1036 PM CDT/936 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles north of Mentone, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Mentone, Bennett, and Slash Ranch. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eddy County Plains; Southern Lea County
